amendment.description: To appropriate funds to develop an environmental impact statement for introducing non-native oyster species into the Chesapeake Bay.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1715 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1715 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11542) To appropriate funds to develop an environmental impact statement for introducing non-native oyster species into the Chesapeake Bay.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1715 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1715 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Warner.
